ExceptionType MMU::Translate (  int  virtAddr,
int *  physAddr,
int  size,
bool  writing
) 
 

Translate an address, and check for alignment. Set the use and dirty bits in the translation entry appropriately, and return an exception code if the translation couldn't be completed.

bool MMU::WriteMem (  int  addr,
int  size,
int  value,
int *  write_time
) 
 

Write or write 1, 2, or 4 bytes of virtual memory (at addr). Return FALSE if a correct translation couldn't be found.
